name: Shopping Tour
description:
“The most important thing to wear is a smile.” ~ Ann Taylor

 

Posh Shopping Tours offers a variety of tour styles or we can venture out with a special mission in mind. You’ll enjoy Posh Perks along the way with swag bags to start off your VIP experience, along with complimentary transportation, and exclusive discounts that will surely make you feel special.

Our guests also receive personalized advice to find go-to elements and polished outfits that help you define their personal style and fit perfectly with your personality. One-of-a-kind fashion treasures await.

Redefine, augment or makeover, from Red Carpet Ready to Coffee Casual, make your look fabulous.
